overview: Bart Catalane joined Webloyalty.com as CFO in 2008 with extensive experience in finance, operations and acquisitions. Prior, he served as Chief Financial Officer of LIN Television Corporation, one of the largest television station groups in the country which reaches an average of 10 million households per week. Prior to LIN, Bart was President and Chief Operating Officer of Ziff-Davis Media where he helped to diversify and grow the business online and turn the company from a $45 million loss to a $20 million profit within 2 years. Bart also held prior senior management and Chief Financial Officer positions with Monster Worldwide and Capital Cities/ABC’s Television and Radio Broadcast Divisions. Bart began his career working as a CPA and staff auditor for Coopers & Lybrand in New York City.
